title: Giro d’Italia Women: Chiara Consonni Pips Lotto Kopecky to Stage 2 Sprint Victory
content:
Late heartbreak for solo leader Ana Vitória Magalhães as Elisa Longo Borghini retains pink jersey.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Women: Chiara Consonni Pips Lotto Kopecky to Stage 2 Sprint Victory on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
